job.title: Software Engineer - C++/QT/QML
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer Networking
job.description: Job Title: Software Engineer - C++/QT/QML Location: Asheville, NC Duration: Full time/ Long Term contract Requirements BS Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent Demonstrated understanding of programming concepts, architecture, and full stack integration Coding experience in C++, QML, and Python Prior experience with QT GUI programming Comfort working in a fast-paced, highly collaborative environment relying on tools such as GIT Ability to document both the requirements and design document as part of standard work. Familiarity with hardware control concepts, such as motion control integration Background in programming interfaces for equipment Embedded Linux OS experience You can also apply via: http://jobd.info/?id=SSrkKp Recruiter Details Praveen Rao (302) 214-0551 praveen_us@falconsmartit.com Find all current job openings at our Career Page https://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.html Follow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunities https://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/
